Position Title:            Sr. Sous ChefEmployment Type:    Full TimeSalary:                        up to 9.5K AED depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Dubai, UAEAbout the Client:An authentic Lebanese restaurant in UAE.Job Description:Assist in overseeing kitchen operations, ensuring efficiency and adherence to quality standards.
Demonstrate strong culinary skills in food preparation and presentation.
Work with the Head Chef to create and update menu offerings.
Maintain food quality and consistency through regular checks.
Train and mentor kitchen staff, fostering a positive work environment.Skills
Skills: ยง Open to Arabic nationals
ยง Male, 45 years old and below
ยง At least 3 years of UAE experience in the same role in restaurants
ยง Must have Lebanese cuisine background and can manage more than 40 employees in the kitchen

Data.Company Industry: Catering, Food Service, & Restaurant; Food & Beverage Production
